title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' functionality does not work consistently. Specifically, after creating a new file (f1.txt) and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: The 'Close All Saved' functionality should close all open files that have been saved, regardless of the number of files or their content.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 

1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Close all editors.
3. Create a new file named f1.txt.
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
